mapper.select: select id, noticeTitle, noticeContent, hits, regDate, editDate from notice where id=#{id};
select id,noticeTitle from notice where id IN ((SELECT id FROM notice WHERE id < #{id} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1),(SELECT id FROM notice WHERE id > #{id} ORDER BY id LIMIT 1));

select id, noticeTitle, noticeContent, hits, regDate, editDate from notice
noticeTitle LIKE concat('%', #{noticeTitle}, '%')
or noticeContent LIKE concat('%', #{noticeContent}, '%')
order by regDate desc
LIMIT ${offset}, ${listCount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (noticeTitle, noticeContent, hits, regDate) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, 0, now());
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET noticeTitle=#{noticeTitle}, noticeContent=#{noticeContent}, hits=#{hits}, editDate=now() WHERE id=#{id};
